segments.text: How may I help you , miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to change my hairstyle . What would you suggest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to have a perm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think it will suit me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I'll have it for a change .
segments.speaker: S2
